sources.title: Silver Spurs (1943)
sources.description: Jerry Johnson inherits a 50,000 acre ranch. Lucky Miller wants to take over the ranch. Roy is trying to get a railroad spur right of way. Lucky has a woman come west to marry Jerry to get control of the ranch. After the wedding, Lucky has the owner killed. Roy’s gun is substituted for the murder weapon, so Roy is put in jail. Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/silver-spurs-1943/

sources.title: Silver Spurs
sources.description: You can find more information regarding this film on its IMDb page .

sources.title: Silver Spurs (1943) ROY ROGERS
sources.description:
Stars: Roy Rogers, Trigger and Smiley Burnette
Director: Joseph Kane

Roy's boss has inherited a very large ranch but the will keeps him from selling it although his widow could. Lucky Miller is out to get control of the ranch so he has a girl come west to marry him. Then after the wedding he has his henchman kill the owner. Roy is nearby and when the murder gun is switched with his, Roy finds himself in jail.

sources.title: Silver Spurs (1943) Roy Rogers & John Carradine Western Classic
sources.description:
The King of the Cowboys goes into action!
Roy's boss has inherited a very large ranch While waiting to obtain a right-of-way through an oil-rich property, ranchers run into an ambitious resort owner, Lucky Miller who is out to get control of the ranch.

Director: Joseph Kane
Writers: John K. Butler, J. Benton Cheney 
Stars: Roy Rogers, Trigger The Smartest Horse in the Movies, Smiley Burnette, John Carradine
Genres: Classics, Western
